self.name: auth.sentCode
self.description: Contains info about a sent verification code.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Contains info about a sent verification code.

arguments.name: phoneCodeHash
arguments.description: Phone code hash, to be stored and later re-used with auth.signIn

arguments.name: nextType
arguments.description: Phone code type that will be sent next, if the phone code is not received within timeout seconds: to send it use auth.resendCode

arguments.name: timeout
arguments.description: Timeout for reception of the phone code

parent.name: auth.SentCode
parent.description: Contains info on a confirmation code message sent via SMS, phone call or Telegram.
